channel.title: toolsHub.builders - Free Online Tools for Everyone
channel.description: Access 20+ free online tools for text, developers, images, and SEO. No sign-up required. Instant results.

item.title: toolsHub.builders - 20+ Free Online Tools Directory
item.description: Access 20+ free online tools for text, developers, images, and SEO. No sign-up required. Instant results. Built for students, creators, and developers.

item.title: All Tools - Explore Our Complete Tool Collection
item.description: Explore our complete collection of free online tools. Text tools, developer tools, image tools, and SEO tools - all in one place.

item.title: Tutorials & Guides - Learn How to Use Tools
item.description: Step-by-step tutorials to master online tools. Learn formatting, conversion, optimization, and more. Beginner-friendly guides with quick results.

item.title: Changelog - Latest Updates and New Features
item.description: Track our progress, new features, and improvements. We ship updates regularly. See what's new in toolsHub.builders.

item.title: Roadmap - What's Coming Next
item.description: Discover what's coming next for toolsHub.builders. See our planned features, upcoming tools, and long-term vision for the free tools platform.

item.title: Word Counter - Count Words, Characters & Sentences
item.description: Free online word counter tool. Instantly count words, characters, sentences, paragraphs, and reading time. Perfect for writers and content creators.

item.title: Character Counter - Count Characters Online
item.description: Count characters online with or without spaces. Perfect for Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn posts and SEO meta descriptions.

item.title: Case Converter - Convert Text Case Instantly
item.description: Free online case converter. Transform text to uppercase, lowercase, title case, sentence case, and toggle case instantly.

item.title: Remove Duplicate Lines - Clean Text Lists
item.description: Free tool to remove duplicate lines from text. Clean up lists, remove repeated entries, and deduplicate content instantly.

item.title: Text to Slug Converter - Create URL-Friendly Slugs
item.description: Convert text to URL-friendly slugs instantly. Create clean, SEO-friendly URLs and permalinks for your content.

item.title: JSON Formatter - Beautify & Validate JSON
item.description: Free online JSON formatter and validator. Beautify JSON with syntax highlighting, error detection, and format compact JSON.

item.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder - Free Base64 Tool
item.description: Free online Base64 encoder and decoder. Convert text and data to Base64 format instantly. No signup required.

item.title: HTML Minifier - Compress HTML Code
item.description: Free online HTML minifier. Compress HTML code, remove whitespace and comments to reduce file size for faster loading.

item.title: CSS Minifier - Compress CSS Code
item.description: Free online CSS minifier. Compress CSS code, remove whitespace and comments to reduce file size for faster loading.

item.title: JWT Decoder - Decode JSON Web Tokens
item.description: Free online JWT decoder. Decode and inspect JSON Web Tokens, view header and payload data instantly.

item.title: Image to Base64 - Convert Images Online
item.description: Free online image to Base64 converter. Convert PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP images to Base64 strings instantly.

item.title: Image Compressor - Free Image Compression
item.description: Free online image compressor. Reduce image file size while maintaining quality. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP formats.

item.title: PNG to JPG Converter - Convert PNG to JPEG
item.description: Free online PNG to JPG converter. Convert PNG images to JPEG format with quality control options.

item.title: Resize Image - Image Resizer Online
item.description: Free online image resizer. Resize images to any dimension, maintain aspect ratio, or set custom size.

item.title: Image Crop Tool - Crop Images Online
item.description: Free online image crop tool. Crop images to any size or aspect ratio with interactive cropping.

item.title: Meta Tag Generator - Create SEO Meta Tags
item.description: Free meta tag generator. Create SEO-friendly meta tags, Open Graph, and Twitter card meta tags for your website.

item.title: Robots.txt Generator - Create Robots.txt File
item.description: Free robots.txt generator. Create robots.txt files to control search engine crawler access to your website.

item.title: Sitemap Generator - Create XML Sitemaps
item.description: Free XML sitemap generator. Create sitemaps for Google and other search engines to improve your SEO.

item.title: Keyword Density Checker - Analyze Keyword Frequency
item.description: Free keyword density checker. Analyze keyword frequency and optimize your content for better SEO rankings.

item.title: Open Graph Generator - Create OG Tags
item.description: Free Open Graph generator. Create OG meta tags for better social media sharing on Facebook, LinkedIn, and more.
